mapper.select: select * from hanium.Company, hanium.recruitment where Company.company_id=recruitment.company_id

select Company.company_id, company_name, company_founded_date, company_scale, company_sector, company_url, company_location from hanium.Company, hanium.recruitment where Company.company_id=recruitment.company_id and company_scale='대기업';

select Company.company_id, company_name, company_founded_date, company_scale, company_sector, company_url, company_location from hanium.Company, hanium.recruitment where Company.company_id=recruitment.company_id
AND work_location like CONCAT('%',#{work_location},'%')
AND recruitment_school like CONCAT('%',#{recruitment_school},'%')
AND company_scale like CONCAT('%',#{company_scale},'%')
AND recruitment_form like CONCAT('%',#{recruitment_form},'%')
